item.title: Menendez brothers' aunt hospitalized after DA shares graphic photos in court
item.description: Erik and Lyle Menendez's 85-year-old aunt, Terry Baralt, was hospitalized in critical condition after prosecutors showed a graphic image of José Menen...

item.title: Katy Perry among all-female Blue Origin crew that completes space trip
item.description: Blue Origin’s NS-31 mission launched into space on Monday morning with an all-female crew, including pop star Katy Perry.

item.title: Retrial opens for Sarah Palin's libel suit against The New York Times
item.description: A retrial is set to begin for Sarah Palin's lawsuit accusing The New York Times of libeling her in an editorial eight years ago

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to host Salvadoran president at White House
item.description: Presidents Donald Trump and Nayib Bukele are scheduled to meet Monday at the White House.
